import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import Calendar from 'react-calendar'; import 'react-calendar/dist/Calendar.css' import Styling from '../styling/Styling' import FoodsDisplay from '../components/Meals/FoodsDisplay' import Breakfast from '../components/Meals/Breakfast' import Lunch from '../components/Meals/Lunch' import Dinner from '../components/Meals/Dinner' import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; // import $ from "../nutritionLabel" import {InputBase, Toolbar, TextField, Button} from "@material-ui/core" const Authorization = ({user}) => { const[date, setDate] =useState(new Date()) const[finditem, setFinditem] = useState("") const [foods,setFoods] = useState([]) const [search, setSearch] = useState("") const onChange = () => { setDate(date) } const handleChange = (event) => { setSearch(event.target.value) } const handleAdd = () => { } console.log(user) const filterLog =(meal) => user.user_foods ? user.user_foods.filter(food => food.meal === meal) : [] // console.log(filterLog("breakfast")) useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:3000/foods") .then(res => res.json()) .then(setFoods) },[]) const searchFoods = () => search ? foods.filter(food => food.name.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())) : [] return (

Your Food Log

{/* {$('#test1').nutritionLabel()} */}

Calendar
{/*
*/}
) } export default Authorization;
